title: MMR
body: How do i increase my MMR, like i've gone from earning a solid 20 in b5, to 14 points for a win and 22 for a loss in b4, managed to twice win 7 games in a row and get up to B3, but it still wont let me get  decent amount of LP for a win. Like what do i have to do?? I win games in a row but still can't improve my MMR, Riot please help or someone?

replies.body: Cause your mmr is stilll low, the winning streaks you get on arn't because of you but because of your team, if you continue winning and losing few then eventually your mmr will improve but if you stay at a division for so long it will be hard for it to improve.

mmr depends on matchmaking more than win/loss. this is why you can climb with a negative winrate early in the season. you obviously are matched against players that are worse than your team, so you gain less lp/mmr for the win. if you are versing enemies who are statistically better than you, you'll get higher gains
